executorsNotApplying.notApplyingReason: This executor died (before the person who has died)
This executor died (after the person who has died)
This executor doesn’t want to apply now, but may do in the future (this is also known as power reserved)
This executor doesn’t want to apply now, and gives up the right to do so in the future (this is also known as renunciation, and the executor will need to fill in a form)

declaration:
I confirm that I will administer the estate of Deceased Person, according to law. I will:
collect the whole estate
keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
keep a full account of how the estate has been distributed
If the probate registry (court) asks me to do so, I will:
provide the full details of the estate and how it has been distributed
return the grant of probate to the court
I understand that:
my application will be rejected if I do not provide information (if asked)
criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against me if I am found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest
I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
legalStatement:
This statement is based on the information given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.
I, Applicant One Name, of 13 Bergamot Crescent Shoreham-By-Sea BN43 6JH make the following statement:
That Deceased Person of A manually entered address, was born on 1 February 1900 and died on 1 February 2000, domiciled in England and Wales.
I will send and sign what I believe to be the true and original last will and testament of Deceased Person.
I am one of the executors named in the will. To the best of my knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in the person who died which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of the person who died and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
That the gross estate value for the estate amounts to £22222 and the net estate value amounts to £1111.
I confirm that the information I have provided is correct to the best of my knowledge.
